metadata.title: CVE-2018-20194 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: There is a stack-based buffer underflow in the third instance of thecalculate_gain function in libfaad/sbr_hfadj.c in Freeware Advanced AudioDecoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.8.8. A crafted input will lead to a denial of serviceor possibly unspecified other impact because limiting the additional noiseenergy level is mishandled for the G_max <= G case.

criterions.comment: faad2 package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
